description.value:
You're a member of a dwarven clan or one of their retainers, and your clan's allegiance lies with Ulrikka Clanholdings. You might be a laborer on a mining rig, a long-distance delivery pilot, or the blood relative of an executive director or other prominent figure.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength or Constitution, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the Athletics skill and the Mining Lore skill. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Hefty Hauler] skill feat.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
